description: Try our easy to follow Jerk Chicken With Broccolini Slaw recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Jerk Chicken With Broccolini Slaw Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Melt butter in a frying pan over high heat and brown chicken all over. Remove chicken from pan and set aside.

Add the lime juice and spices to the frying pan and cook for one minute or until fragrant. Rub chicken all over with spice mixture including the cavity. Place chicken into slow cooker. Cover and cook on low for 6 hours.

To make the broccolini slaw, heat oil in a large frying pan on lowmedium heat. Add broccolini and cook for 2-3 minutes or until almost tender. Remove from heat and add coleslaw mix and lime juice. Toss all the ingredients to combine.
Remove chicken from slow cooker and shred meat from the bone. Separate shredded chicken into 6 serves. Serve each portion with slaw and spinach leaves.
